name: Rat Spat
description:
- = Made for E1M1 Game Jam = -

Story:
Moira and her rat posse have taken over the Dairy Factory, hoarding all the cheese for themselves! This wouldn't have bothered you, Biker Cat, if they hadn't stopped the production of all dairy products. Without your milk fix, you've decided to take matters into your own claws.

Controls:

Movement - WASD & Arrow Keys
Interact - E
Attack - Up Arrow
Switch Weapon - Tab

Credits:

  • Various sounds from Freesound.org
  • Raycasting Game Maker
